name: Mr. Lasso
description:
You're Mr. Lasso!

Lasso up some sheep and boars to hone your rope skills. When you're ready, claim the bounty for the dastardly Diggle! That no good vermin has been harassing our town with his gang of banditos.

Hold mouse1 to swing your lasso and release to fire

Press mouse2 to shoot your revolver

Press Space to release what you've caught with your lasso

Check out the bounty board for what's up next

The sheep are easy to lasso, just don't scare em' off

The boars are a little tougher, you might need to get em' to stop moving before you can lasso them.

Diggle's shotgun is undefeated and he's the fastest bandito in the west

Made by cosmicsans and itsBoats in 48 hours for GMTK game jam!
